visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Use for the main upload area to signal 'active' state.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use for sticky headers and floating action bars (backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/80).
visual_enhancers.noise_texture: Subtle grain overlay on the landing page background to reduce digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.micro_interactions: Hover lift on cards (-translate-y-1), smooth color transitions on buttons.

hero_background.description: Abstract white wavy surface with grid pattern
hero_background.usage: Hero section background with low opacity overlay

about_section.usage: Features or About section to imply productivity

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text meets APCA standards. Use slate-600+ for text on white.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use the 'Manrope' font for all headings and 'IBM Plex Sans' for body text.
Create a 'Tracing Beam' effect for the file upload dropzone.
Ensure the dashboard grid follows 'Mode B: High Density Grid'.
Use the provided image URLs for the landing page.
Do NOT use generic gradients; use the specified 'hero_glow' or solid colors.
All interactive elements MUST have data-testid attributes.
Keep the UI clean, professional, and trustworthy.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetic (generic centered layouts, uniform styling).
Create depth through layered design elements (z-index, shadows).
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Do NOT apply universal transitions (e.g., transition: all).
Do NOT center align the app container globally.
Use modern button styles (pill-shaped or sharp).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Prioritize using pre-existing Shadcn components from src/components/ui.
